review: The best review I can give a product is to say it does what it promised and was worth what I paid for. That definitely describes the Amazon Fire TV. The set up was fast and easy; and, yes, unless I mumble or mispronounce a word, the voice remote works well.

review: Voice option, works like a charm. It has been the best experience, with any Streaming device I have had. Excellent product, recommended to others in the family.

review: I am very happy with my Amazon  Fire TV. It was easy to hook up just like they 123. And in few minutes I was watching movies. So happy with it that I purchased one for a Christmas gift for a friend.
